lead_paragraph: HECHTMAN--Arnold, 91, of New Hyde Park, NY passed away on June 30, 2016. Beloved father of Debbie, Gail and Howard. Adored Poppy of Courtney, Jordan, Evan, Jennifer and Ethan. Celebrated World War II Veteran and President of the Hollywood Advertising Company for over 30 years. Service at Sinai Chapels in Fresh Meadows, New York on Sunday, July 3 at 11:30am. 1/3
